SAM.description_of_public: The serviceable available market focuses on students aged 17-27 in the EU who are likely to purchase lifestyle products. This demographic represents a significant portion of the TAM, specifically targeting students in universities and high schools who prioritize sustainability and health.
SAM.justification: SAM represents approximately 40% of TAM, focusing on the EU market where sustainability initiatives and student engagement are strong. This segment captures the demand from environmentally conscious consumers and institutions, leveraging partnerships for mass customization. The growth is estimated at 5-10% annually as awareness and demand for sustainable products increase.
